Razor Claw looked around the ground wondering what had just happened,  he k=
new that he was alive but didn't understand why. he wanted to get up and go=
 after them but wouldn't know what to do if he caught up with them. he forc=
ed himself to his four wolverine feet trying to adjust. "Thank you" was all=
 he could think to mutter, but his thanks went unheard for his rescuers wer=
e already gone.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, March 04, 2001 10:17 PM
  Subject: The=
 wolf bots.


  ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
   
      They got Razor Claw=
 back to the CF. Then they turned and walked away, into the distance. They =
deactivaed their comm systems and anything that would allow them to be foun=
d. They just went wondering.

        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
       
      =
